channel.title: Gain Control Per OSC via Pots? (noob)
channel.description: Hi there, I have three multiwave objects that I would like to trigger with midi and control the gain through the pots on my axocontrol but I can't work out how to do this, I'm new to all this stuff and I barely played with MAX MSP before getting my board!

item.title: Gain Control Per OSC via Pots? (noob)
item.dc:creator: @Ludopathic
item.description:
@Ludopathic wrote:

Thanks, that worked, although whenever I pressed a keyboard key the pitch would change but the sound was constant, should I add an ADSR envelope before the VCA?

Read full topic
item.source: Gain Control Per OSC via Pots? (noob)

item.title: Gain Control Per OSC via Pots? (noob)
item.dc:creator: @janvantomme Jan Vantomme
item.description:
@janvantomme wrote:

Run the signal of the potentiometer (analog in) and the oscillator through a VCA.

Read full topic
